channel.title: anki on ZL3CLV
channel.description: Recent content in anki on ZL3CLV

item.title: External Link: NZ Amateur Radio License Anki Deck
item.description: This is an Anki deck I made for memorising everything you need to know to pass the NZ Amateur Radio license test. The questions/answers were all pulled from the public-domain list that is maintained on the NZART page. You can download the deck from the AnkiWeb page.
